item.description:
Join NetSAP Boston Happy Hour on March 16th at Gypsy Bar's VIP Section and mingle with Boston's finest crowd !

Go Green for St. Patrick's Day and win door prizes for Best Dressed Male and Female !

From 8p to 11p. Free for NetSAP Members. $10.00 for Non-Members.

We'll also give out Membership Cards along with Complimentary Meal Gift Cards from GURU THE CATERER to first 50 members to attend this event !

WE THANK 'GURU THE CATERER' FOR THIS GENEROSITY !

***********************************************
Sign up for NetSAP membership in advance to reap benefits: 
http://na.netip.org/members/join
***********************************************
item.name: NetSAP's March Cocktail Party!!
